description: This file defines API routes for a URL shortening service using FastAPI. It includes a POST endpoint to create shortened URLs, archiving the original URL and returning a response with the shortened link details.

classes.name: models.ShortenResponse
classes.description: Response model for URL shortening, including URL details and archive timestamp.

classes.name: models.ShortenRequest
classes.description: Request model containing the target URL and optional note for creating a shortened link.

classes.name: models.ErrorMessage
classes.description: Model representing an error message response.

methods.name: models.ShortenResponse create_short_link(payload: models.ShortenRequest)
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create and archive a short URL, returning its details.
